typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SOURCE_CODE_KEY as string,
		SOURCE_SYSTEM as string,
		TARGET_CODE as string,
		TARGET_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CODE_TYPE as string,
		CODE_TYPE_ID as double,
		CODE2 as string,
		OM_X_REF as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> TCrossReference
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == -3) ~> ProdGroups
TCrossReference filter(CODE_TYPE_ID == 122) ~> CoverageCodes
CoverageCodes, ProdGroups join(TCrossReference@SOURCE_CODE_KEY == TCrossReference@SOURCE_CODE_KEY,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
